item.title: Meta set to alter labels for AI-generated images - The Jerusalem Post
item.description:
1. Meta set to alter labels for AI-generated images  The Jerusalem Post
  2. 'I feel violated': Some Utah artists upset about Meta AI scraping their art  KSL.com
  3. Instagram's “Made with AI” label swapped out for “AI info” after photographers' complaints  The Verge

  5. Meta changes its labels for AI-generated images after complaints from photographers  Engadget
